message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it's fair to start our negotiation at $7500. This is an excellent opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $7500 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to get it closer to $7000.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value of the product, I would like to counter your offer at $7200. This price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
